info.title: Blitz OpenAPI Reference
info.description:
Welcome to the Blitz API Reference.

Use this interactive documentation to test endpoints directly in your browser. Authentication is required via the `x-api-key` header.

get.description:
### üí∞ Cost: 0 Credits

Check the API key information, current credit balance and plan status

post.description:
### üí∞ Cost: 5 Credits (on success)

Identify a professional and retrieve their full profile starting from a verified phone number.

person.headline: Founder @BlitzAPI ‚Äî B2B Data APIs for Prospecting, Enrichment & Personalization at Scale | GTME
person.about_me: I build developer-first tools for scalable, intelligent B2B prospecting. I\'m the‚Ä¶

experiences.job_description: We help GTM teams win faster by making high-quality B2B data and intent signals instantly available ‚Äî directly in your existing stack. What we doBlitzAPI is an API-only platform for Growth, RevOps, and SalesOps teams to: Search: find the right people & companies (Waterfall ICP, LinkedIn/company/domain lookups, engagement search) Enrich: add verified emails, direct phone numbers & LinkedIn details in real time Validate: advanced catch-all email verification to maximize deliverability Scrape LinkedIn signals: posts, reactions, comments & activity for hyper-relevant outreach Why BlitzAPI- Real-time & precise ‚Äî no stale databases- API-first & composable ‚Äî works with N8N, Make, Clay, HubSpot, Salesforce, Smartlead‚Ä¶- Transparent pricing ‚Äî credits instead of per-seat fees- Speed-to-market ‚Äî prototype and scale playbooks in days, not months Use cases our customers loveHigh-deliverability outbound campaignsABM with Waterfall ICP targetingSocial selling with LinkedIn engagement triggersReal-time lead routing & enrichment

example.message: Missing API key, please provide a valid API key in the 'x-api-key' header
